data.text: @YourAlberta Masks don't work, vax doesn't work. Y'll just need to give it a rest!
@YourAlberta Onmy God.  Can't believe  how the mask stops anything  . How the world  is brainwashed  so fast  .  U good man kenny

@YourAlberta Please expedite legislation to stop municipalities like @CityofEdmonton from continuing to impose a mask mandate. Are we not alll Albertans? @AmarjeetSohiYEG is guilty of overreach. @jkenney, please hurry the legislation! #Edmonton #YEG
@YourAlberta There’s high risk people everywhere…should have just kept the masks…I say into the void

@YourAlberta I wish you guys would stop Kenny before more people die. Kenny believes we are out of this and it's ok now to go without a mask. My mask will stay on thank you. I'm 55 and suffer from anaphylaxis shock so, can't get vaccine. THANK YOU YOU GUYS ROCK!

@YourAlberta Excluding Edmonton where our City Council understands that masking reduces transmission- especially when Prov government refuses to be transparent about Covid transmission cases, waste water data, new variants of concern, and death case from Omicron.
@YourAlberta We need to stop wearing seatbelts because according to Jason Kenny just like masks they are damaging restrictions…… really Jason Kenny they both save lives !!!!!’
